Features.name: Accelerator
Features.description: Accelerator makes sure to receive inquiries from valid users, and based on the data received and the user's history, will recommend the 3 categories where the user should save to achieve their savings goals.

work.title: API MessageGenerator connects to the cloud to access the messages that will be sent to users, then selects the most recent message from the entire list of messages to be always up to date and this is sent to the application so that every day the user has a message and/or advice to improve their financial health.
